actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day.

summary.text: Provides for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as "Veteran's Day", and makes such day a legal public holiday.

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day.
